version_description: Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

* Market Comparison tool for new cars. Compare pricing on vehicles with similar cars in your area. Used car comparison coming soon.
* Added ability to contact dealers directly from Search Results - quickly contact sellers via phone or email
* Fixed bug causing app to freeze on certain searches
* Miscellaneous bug fixes and performance improvements

* Market Comparison Tool - See what other similar vehicles in your area are listed at to help determine a fair price
* Improved functionality for VIN Scanning feature - quickly access information about a car while on the dealer's lot
* Share listings with your friends using a wider variety of apps
* Bug fixes
Performance enhancements and bug fixes.

We are believers in scheduled maintenance so we took our app in for its 6.5K mile tune-up. The following tasks were performed:
- Wiped bugs from windshield
- Performance tuning for added horsepower
- New App smell air freshener

We would love to hear your feedback!

Added more filters for the most requested features.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

You found a sweet set of wheels and want more info but not at the price of giving up your contact information to a someone you've never met.  We heard you!  This release we've added new anonymous chat available with participating dealers.  Dealer chat puts you back in the driver’s seat to get the answers you need on your terms without the fear of being contacted when you don't want to be.  You can now send dealer questions anonymously about your dream car and view your conversation history through our new seller messages portal.  More fun, less drag.

Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Thanks for using Cars.com!  We’re happy to announce that we now have a brand new navigation that will make finding your next dream car as easy as possible.  We’ve adopted the "Tab Bar" navigation at the bottom, allowing all of our fans to move quickly from page to page so they can have a faster and more intuitive shopping experience.  Please let us know how you like it!

Thanks for using Cars.com!

Our team has been hard at work on a new Vehicle Page which we’re sure you’ll love. Bigger pictures, new icons, and modern navigation will allow you to easily find the car of your dreams. Please let us know how you like it & Happy Holidays!

The Cars.com Mobile Apps Team
Performance enhancements and bug fixes.
Performance enhancements and bug fixes.

Hey Cars.com Fans!

Buy a car from someone you trust. Now when you email a dealer, you can select who you'd like to work with based on customer reviews. Newly added salesperson reviews are now available for selected dealers.

Please let us know what you think!

Thanks for all the support,

The Cars.com App Team

Hey Cars.com Fans!

We've updated our "Search Results Page" - which will allow you to see a ton more vehicles after your search! We've also made it easier to favorite vehicles, making sure you'll be able to narrow your search down & find the Car of your dreams.

Please let us know what you think!

The Cars.com Mobile App Team.
Performance enhancements and bug fixes.

Thanks for using Cars.com! Another round of app optimizations, making sure you have a great & fast car shopping experience!
The Cars.com Mobile Apps Team

Hey Cars.com Fans!

We’ve squashed some bugs and have addressed issues making our app more stable and easier to use.

Please let us know what you think!
The Cars.com App Team
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Searching for your dream car and haven’t found the one? Test drive our new matchmaking tool and fall in love with your next car. This innovative feature is the next step in delivering a unique, personalized, and highly relevant shopping experience that can only be found through Cars.com.

We hope you enjoy matchmaker, please share any feedback so we can continue to improve!

We hope you enjoy matchmaker, please share any feedback so we can continue to improve!

This release includes improvements to matchmaker, the next step in delivering a unique, personalized and relevant shopping experience that can only be found through Cars.com. Of course, we're always squashing as many bugs as we can.

Come take it for a test drive, and let us know what you think.
Not feeling a spark? Now you can swipe left on recommended cars you don’t like when you search by lifestyle. We also removed some speed bumps for a smoother faster ride.
Live chat now available for participating dealers!  Quickly get directions, schedule a test drive, and get the information you need to find out if this ride is the one.

We heard your feedback and made improvements in the latest update. Now you can tailor your search on the home page so you can spend less time searching and more time cruising in your car. If you don't know what kind of car you want, try our matchmaker search to find one that fits your lifestyle.
We tried something new and we heard you loud and clear.  With that, we will be returning to the price, make and model filters you know and love.  Thanks!

Hey Cars.com Fans!

We’ve continued to find ways to make your car shopping experience better, while squashing a few bugs that were affecting a few of you.

Please let us know what you think!

The Cars.com Mobile App Team.

Hey Cars.com Fans!

We’ve updated our home screen & included new “recommended vehicles” based on the cars that you’ve shown interest in.

We’ve also introduced a new price graph, showing you how your vehicles compares to similar vehicles and if what you’re potentially buying is a ‘great deal’, ‘good deal’, or ‘bad deal’.

Finally, we fixed a few issues some users were having!

Thank you,

The Cars.com App Team

Hey Cars.com Fans!

We did a deep clean & detail of the “Saved” section of our app. You’ll see bigger pictures, more detail & just an overall better experience. We also fixed a few issues some users were having & improved the sort/filter functionality.

Please let us know what you think!

The Cars.com App Team

Hello Cars.com Fans!

As usual, in this release, we addressed a few minor bugs a few of you have been experiencing.

In addition, you'll see some improvements that will help ease your car searching experience. The organization of search filters has been updated to make for easier scanning. Also, your saved cars will now include call outs on fair, good, and great deals, price drops, and if it’s a hot car and likely to sell soon.

Please let us know what you think.

The Cars.com App Team

Bug fixes and feature enhancements

Hi Cars.com Fans!
We’ve fixed a few errors & also removed matchmaker, but have kept all other functionality that you love. Thanks again for being a loyal Cars.com fan!
The Cars.com Mobile Apps Team.

Hi Cars.com Fans!

We've fixed a few errors and also added new "home delivery" & "virtual appointment" badges to help you find Cars that can be delivered straight to your home. We've also added the ability to sign-in with Apple!

Thanks again for being a loyal Cars.com fan!

Check out the new Cars.com! You’ll experience:

- A faster, redesigned app
- Improved listings and 50,000+ cars added daily
- Light and dark modes
- Enhanced filters including virtual appointments and home delivery

The Cars.com team is committed to creating an enjoyable car shopping experience that will help you find a car you love. If you experience any problems or bugs, use the Feedback button in the menu or send us a message to feedback@cars.com. Please include the device and version of iOS you are using. Thanks!
